title: Mixed-Methods Teaching Approach to Enhance Early Algebraic Thinking and Mathematical Communication

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary algebra concepts and basic mathematical expression skills
context.additional_context: A course for learners in managerial/leadership roles, focusing on enhancing mathematical thinking applicable to workplace tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical ideas through structured narratives and visual materials
Learners can clearly communicate problem-solving processes based on algebraic thinking both verbally and in writing
Learners can systematically organize concepts by applying a communication framework (word usage, visual media, narrative structure, conventions).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
